step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Ensure your elbows stay close together as you begin to lift.
You're doing well lifting your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you move them behind you.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
You held the position well. Continue to focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding forward pulling.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Ensure your elbows stay close as you bring your hands back to your lap.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close as you move your hands behind your head and focus on keeping your head upright throughout the movement.
